Author: 4gotmyfuckinpassword
Text: Hahaha thanks I’m trying not to die just yet :P   It just sucks that logic doesn’t work here, or I guess if it didn’t, half the shit about this disorder wouldn’t exist lmao

Author: HBStone
Text: I FEEL THIS! Ugh, it drives me crazy. Logically I KNOW it’s fine but I just can’t accept it.  As for the water thing... adding in electrolytes is totally fine, it’s like taking a vitamin while you fast. Like... maybe your body can go awhile without food but without vitamins, water, salt...? You will have a heart attack and die (: no bueno. So drink the water with the stuff and don’t die please <3
